content: note since you re knitting in the round with stripes you will want to use a jogless stripes technique of your choosing to avoid a jag when you change colors i have included links to 2 blogs within my pattern for your reference this is my first ever pattern creation and design contribution there have been some wonderful color combinations by other ravelers and i ve thoroughly enjoyed seeing all the projects as requested i ve revised the pattern to include toddler sizing you should also now be able to download the pattern to your computer click knit enjoy
